title: [FSX/P3D] FSDT Fsdreamteam KLAS
description:
At long last I present you a fully cracked version of KLAS by FSDT.

1. Disconnect internet
2. Start installer and choose to use local bglmanx.dll files.
3. When it asks to update afcad's, reconnect internet and update them. 
4. Copy files from the addon manager to main sim directory. 
5. Start your sim and enjoy!

I have tons of torrents that other "lazy" uploaders wont upload. This includes Aerosoft aspen, aerosoft boston city, etc.

Leave a req for a specific torrent and i will upload it. If you have any trouble leave your comment below and I'll respond
